item.title: Argonauts Gang Part II
item.dc:creator: Steve Gillmor
item.description: Jason Calacanis joins the Gillmor Gang — Mike Vizard, Dan Farber, and Steve Gillmor — for a trip that answers the musical question: Why is Steve so angry? Part II of III Argonauts Gang Part II : May 22, 2006 26 minutes 20 seconds
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Addiction Gang Part IV

item.description: Nick (Blogging Doesn’t Matter) Carr rejoins the Gillmor Gang–Mike Arrington (Part I & II), Mike Vizard (Parts I, II, and III), Dana Gardner, Doc Searls, and Dan Farber–for a trip down the rabbithole to Steve’s world of no links, search, or Office. item.title: Remedial Gang Part III
item.dc:creator: Steve Gillmor
item.description: Back to basics, the Gillmor Gang — Dana Gardner, Dan Farber, Mike Arrington, Mike Vizard, and me, Steve Gillmor, rakes the week over the coals. The jury remains out on RSS in the enterprise, but I’d Rather be Dan than Bush in Part III of III. Remedial Gang Part III: May 7, 2006 27 minutes 25 seconds
item.content:encoded:
Back to basics, the Gillmor Gang — Dana Gardner, Dan Farber, Mike Arrington, Mike Vizard, and me, Steve Gillmor, rakes the week over the coals. The jury remains out on RSS in the enterprise, but I’d Rather be Dan than Bush in Part III of III.

Remedial Gang Part III: May 7, 2006
27 minutes 25 seconds

item.title: Remedial Gang Part II
item.dc:creator: Steve Gillmor
item.description: Back to basics, the Gillmor Gang — Dana Gardner, Dan Farber, Mike Arrington, Mike Vizard, and me, Steve Gillmor, rakes the week over the coals. Sun, Sun, Sun…. here it comes, in Part II of III. Remedial Gang Part II: April 29, 2006 27 minutes 25 seconds
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Remedial Gang Part I
item.dc:creator: Steve Gillmor
item.description: Back to basics, the Gillmor Gang — Dana Gardner, Dan Farber, Mike Arrington, Mike Vizard, and me, Steve Gillmor, rakes the week over the coals. Arrington meets Edwards, Microsoft drops a ton on Wall Street, and Sun sparks the conventional wisdom in Part I of III. Remedial Gang Part I: April 28, 2006 27 minutes 25 seconds
item.content:encoded:
Back to basics, the Gillmor Gang — Dana Gardner, Dan Farber, Mike Arrington, Mike Vizard, and me, Steve Gillmor, rakes the week over the coals. Arrington meets Edwards, Microsoft drops a ton on Wall Street, and Sun sparks the conventional wisdom in Part I of III.

Remedial Gang Part I: April 28, 2006
27 minutes 25 seconds

item.title: Syndicate Gang Part III
item.dc:creator: Steve Gillmor
item.description: A Gillmor Gang special edition: a three-part conversation between Syndicate NY keynoters Amanda Congdon, Jeff Jarvis, Doc Searls, Richard Edelman, substituting for Robert Scoble as he does very well (not in NY but the next time in SF) Mr. Mike-rophone Arrington, and me, Steve Gillmor. Part III of III. Syndicate Gang Part III: April [...]
item.content:encoded:
A Gillmor Gang special edition: a three-part conversation between Syndicate NY keynoters Amanda Congdon, Jeff Jarvis, Doc Searls, Richard Edelman, substituting for Robert Scoble as he does very well (not in NY but the next time in SF) Mr. Mike-rophone Arrington, and me, Steve Gillmor. Part III of III.

Syndicate Gang Part III: April 27, 2006
27 minutes 30 seconds
